subject: Baseball
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: On July 7, 1964, Johnny Callison’s ninth-inning homer decided the first All-Star Game hosted by the Mets. The rosters included 18 future Hall of Famers.
snippet: On July 7, 1964, Johnny Callison’s ninth-inning homer decided the first All-Star Game hosted by the Mets. The rosters included 18 future Hall of Famers.
